name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This is the first major update since my health issues; so I did my best to make it a banger! A new mapping system has been introduced into the mod, which should add some more endgame content and replayability into the mix. Got a few new custom patreon items added and some other random goodies. As always, check out our Discord for more info and full changelogs. Enjoy!

I would like to take the time to officially say thank you for everyone's continued patience and support during this 'slow time' as I bounce back from my health issues. I feel guilty enough as-is, so I appreciate that it's not coming from you guys also, heh. You guys are rockstars as always, and I hope to continue normal development pacing soon!
